TEXT.TITLE: MCCLAIN INDUSTRIES <MCCL> SETS STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: McClain Industries Inc said its board declared a four-for-three stock split, payable 30, record April 15. The company also said it plans to open within the next 90 days a 114,000 square foot plant in Macon, Ga., that will allow it to expand production of transfer trailers and other products. Reuter
